name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Operating Systems Fundamentals

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Op: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Operating Systems Fundamentals The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Operating Systems Fundamentals is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: LFCS: Linux Foundation Certified IT Associate Examination

courses.subject: CST
courses.title: Microcomputer Operating Systems II: Server Systems
